TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MapArea extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class MapArea Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type MapArea = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

span.span: Represents a map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示客户端图像映射的映射区, 并对应于 HTML \<区域 > 标记。 The class represents a map area of a client-side image map, and corresponds to an HTML \ tag. 对象存储在类中。The objects are stored in the class. 有以下两种类型的 对象：There are two types of objects: - 当图表元素 (例如, 数据点、序列、图例项或条带线对象) 具有非空`ToolTip` `Url`或`MapAreaAttributes`属性时, 将自动创建的地图区域为:还将创建客户端图像映射。Map areas that are automatically created when a chart element - for example, a data point, series, legend item or strip line object - has a non-empty `ToolTip`, `Url` or `MapAreaAttributes` property; note that other HTML elements that are required for a client-side image map are also created. 在这种情况下, 映射区域的尺寸和位置由图表元素自动确定。In this case, the dimensions and location of a map area are automatically determined by the chart element. 在运行时使用根对象的事件删除或修改这些映射区。Use the event of the root object to delete or modify these map areas at run time. - 具有用户定义的形状和坐标的自定义地图区域。Custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates. 使用对象的属性可在设计时或运行时添加这些自定义映射区。Use the property of the object to add these custom map areas at design time or run time. 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要使用前面所述的对象创建图像映射, 则对象的属性必须设置为。To create an image map using the previously described objects, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时, 可以创建图像映射, 但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 对于自定义对象 , 属性会确定形状, 而属性确定映射区的位置。For custom objects, the property determines the shape, and the property determines the location of the map area. 可以为所有映射区域设置工具提示、超链接或属性, 例如 Target = _Blank 或 OnClick = "javascript: MyJavaScriptFunction ()"。Tooltips, hyperlinks, or attributes, such as Target=_Blank or OnClick="javascript:MyJavaScriptFunction()", can be set for all map areas. 使用属性可确定映射区是否为自定义对象; 即, 它是否具有用户定义的形状和坐标。 Use the property to determine whether a map area is a custom object; that is, whether it has user-defined shape and coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可用于创建和初始化类的新实例。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 不过, 创建自定义对象的一种更简单的方法是使用类的`Add`一个`Insert`或多个重载方法。However, an easier way to create a custom object is to use one of the overloaded `Add` or `Insert` methods of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的坐标。

span.span: Gets or sets the coordinates of a object.

value.span: 依赖于映射区形状的坐标数组。

span.span: An array of coordinates that is dependent on the shape of the map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于设置自定义地图区对象的坐标, 该对象具有用户定义的形状和坐标。The property is usually used to set the coordinates of a custom map area object that has a user-defined shape and coordinates. 必须为自定义映射区指定的坐标取决于映射区的形状:The coordinates that must be specified for a custom map area depend on the shape of the map area: - 单独.Circle. 必须提供三个坐标: "x1, y1, r", 其中 "x1, y2" 是圆圈中心的坐标, "r" 表示圆的半径。Three coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, r", where "x1, y2" are the coordinates of the center of the circle, and "r" is the radius of the circle. - 矩形.Rectangle. 必须提供四个坐标: "x1, y1, x2, y2", 其中 "x1, y1" 是矩形左上角的坐标, "x2, y2" 是矩形右下角的坐标。Four coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, x2, y2", where "x1, y1" are the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle and "x2, y2" are the coordinates of the lower-right corner of the rectangle. - 各.Polygon. 必须提供两个或更多 x 和 y 对 "x1, y1, x2, y2 ..."xn, yn ", 其中每个" x, y "对包含多边形的一个顶点的坐标。Two or more x and y pairs must be provided "x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn", where each "x, y" pair contains the coordinates of one vertex of the polygon. 设置坐标时, 使用图表的相对坐标系统, 其中图表图像的左上角为 "0, 0", 图像的右下角为 "100100"。When setting coordinates, use the relative coordinate system of the chart, where the top-left corner of the chart image is "0,0" and the bottom-right corner of the image is "100,100". 为地图区域定义了形状和坐标后, 可以使用、 和/或属性指定特定的用户交互。After the shape and coordinates are defined for the map area, the , and/or properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction. 请注意以下事项：Note the following: - 仅在根 对象的属性为`true`(默认值) 时, 才会在运行时创建客户端图像映射。A client-side image map will only be created at run time if the property of the root object is `true`, which is the default. - 若要通过将对象添加到地图区集合来创建图像映射, 则 对象的属性必须设置为。To create an image map by adding a object to the map areas collection, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时, 可以创建图像映射, 但必须使用特殊技术。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.

summary.span: 获取或设置映射区的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of the map area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示对应于特定图表元素的映射区的特性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of the map area that corresponds to a particular chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性, 则会自动创建一个客户端图像映射, 并将创建一个映射区, 其中包含附加到\<映射 > 标记的属性字符串, 该标记与要为其设置此属性的对象相对应。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created, and a map area will be created with the attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the object that this property is being set for. 例如, 使用此属性设置 Target 属性并设置第一个数据`Url`点的属性, 将导致类似于以下内容的 HTML 代码:For example, setting the Target attribute using this property and setting the `Url` property of the first data point will result in HTML code that is similar to the following: ```html ... ``` 由于将整个字符串追加到\<映射 > 标记, 因此应使用空格分隔多个属性。Because the entire string is appended to the \ tag, multiple attributes should be separated with a space. 属性可与属性结合使用, 以指定地图区属性 (如 Target = _blank) 以及客户端事件处理程序 (如 OnClick = "MyEvent ()")。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes such as Target= _Blank, as well as client-side event handlers such as OnClick="MyEvent()". 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射, 则对象的属性必须设置为。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时, 可以创建图像映射, 但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 设置此属性时, 可以使用特殊关键字。Special keywords can be used when you set this property. 每个关键字都将替换为适用的图表元素中的某些类型的数据。Each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element. 有关所有可用关键字的列表, 请参阅下表:Refer to the following table for a list of all available keywords: |关键字Keyword|替换者Replaced by| |-------------|-----------------| |#VALX#VALX|数据点的 X 值。X-value of the data point.| |#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3 ...#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3…|数据点的 Y 值。Y-values of the data point.| |#SER#SER|序列名称。Series name.| |#LABEL#LABEL|数据点标签。Data point label.| |#INDEX#INDEX|数据点索引。Data point index.| |#PERCENT#PERCENT|数据点 Y 值的百分比。Percentage of the data point Y-value.| |#TOTAL#TOTAL|序列中所有 Y 值的总计。Total of all Y-values in the series.| |#LEGENDTEXT#LEGENDTEXT|图例文本。Legend text.| 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射, 请使用根对象的属性。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定了映射区对象的形状。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the shape of a map area object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常用于设置自定义地图区对象的形状, 该对象具有用户定义的形状和坐标。This property is usually used to set the shape of a custom map area object, which has a user-defined shape and coordinates. 自定义映射区的形状决定了必须指定的坐标类型, 而可用形状是圆形、矩形和多边形。The shape of the custom map area determines the type of coordinates that must be specified, and available shapes are circles, rectangles and polygons. 检索存储 在中的对象的形状时, 任何不是矩形或圆形的形状都将被视为多边形。When retrieving the shapes of objects that are stored in the , any shape that is not a rectangle or a circle will be considered a polygon. 例如, 可以使用对象作为参数将自定义映射区添加到地图区集合, 这允许使用任意类型的形状。For example, a custom map area can be added to the map areas collection using a object as a parameter, which allows any type of shape to be used. 如果检索此特定对象的属性, 它将返回。If the property of this particular object is retrieved, it will return a . 定义映射区的形状和坐标后, 可以使用、 和/或属性指定特定的用户交互。After the shape and coordinates of a map area are defined, the , and/or properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction. 请注意以下事项：Note the following: - 仅当根图表对象的 IsMapEnabled 属性为 true (这是默认值) 时, 才会在运行时创建客户端图像映射。A client-side image map will only be created at run-time if the IsMapEnabled property of the root Chart object is true, which is the default. - 若要通过将 MapArea 对象添加到地图区集合来创建图像映射, 图表对象的 RenderType 属性必须为 RenderType. ImageTag。To create an image map by adding a MapArea object to the map areas collection the RenderType property of the Chart object MUST be RenderType.ImageTag. 使用二进制流式处理时, 可以创建图像映射, 但必须使用特殊技术。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToolTip { get; set; }
.property instance string ToolTip
Public Property ToolTip As String
public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTip : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置映射区的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip for the map area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图表元素的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip of the chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将自动生成一个客户端图像映射, 并将使用 "Title" 属性设置为指定的工具提示字符串来创建映射区。Setting this property will automatically result in a client-side image map being created, and a map area will be created with the Title attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 映射区将使用与相关图表元素对应的维度。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如, 如果为数据点设置了属性, 则在运行时将生成类似于以下代码的 HTML 代码:For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following code will be generated at run time: \\\\\\ 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射, 则对象的属性必须设置为。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时, 可以创建图像映射, 但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 此属性允许您设置特殊关键字, 以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射, 请使用根对象的属性。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

summary.span: 获取或设置映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.

value.span: 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则会被视为相对 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes, it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 设置此属性时, 将自动创建一个客户端图像映射, 并将使用 HREF 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL 来创建映射区。When you set this property, a client-side image map will automatically be created, and a map area will be created with the HREF attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 此映射区域还将使用与相关图表元素对应的维度。This map area will also use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如, 如果为数据点设置 HREF 属性, 则在运行时将生成类似于以下内容的 HTML 代码:For example, if the HREF property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: ```html
...


 ``` 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则设置此属性将不起作用。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射, 则对象的属性必须设置为。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时, 可以创建图像映射, 但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 可以通过使用属性来指定地图区域的属性 (例如 TARGET =-空白)。Attributes of the map area(s), such as TARGET=-Blank, can be specified by using the property. 此属性允许您设置特殊关键字, 以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射, 请使用根对象的属性。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.
